title.rendered: Up close and personal with the Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra

content.rendered:
For months, we’ve been anticipating the release of the next Note range and we can finally get up close and personal with the Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra. After waiting for months, the excitement around this handset has been confirmed. All the amazing rumours have been proven and we’ve even seen a few new features that you’re going to love too.

 

What’s on the inside?

The insides of any phone is where you’re going to want to know what’s going on. With different key components, you can get one of the most important phones ever. Inside the Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra, you can find some legendary pieces of kit. For example, the brains of the phone is an Exynos 990 chipset. With this chip, you’re going to be able to experience faster speeds than ever before. Paired with a 5G ready plan, you’ll get to enjoy buffer free streaming and uninterrupted uploads and downloads.

With help from the Exynos chip, you’ll also get an amazing battery life. Inside the Note 20 Ultra is a 4500mAh battery that’s capable of holding hours’ worth of use. Even if you stream, download, upload or play games, you should find that the battery doesn’t drop too much. Whenever you do find the battery running low, you can choose from the multitude of charging capabilities to power it back up. This includes fast charging, fast wireless charging and even reverse wireless charging. Never find yourself stuck with a dead phone when you’ve got the Note 20 Ultra.

In terms of memory amounts, the Note 20 Ultra only comes in 256GB. This isn’t a bad thing at all. This memory storage is a huge amount which usually sits at the highest amount on offer. With this being the standard storage option, you’ll find that you’re able to store endless amounts of data on the Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra. If you even do run low, there’s no room for external memory to be added so you would need to take a look at other cloud storage options.

 

Camera System

In the past few months, we’ve seen nothing but quality from the Samsung camera systems. From the S20 range to the A71, Samsung have seriously upped their game in the photography area. If a camera set up is something you’re in great need of, look no further than the Note 20 Ultra. Featured on the front of the phone, there’s a tiny 10MP punch hole camera and this can do some great things. You’re going to be experiencing some of the clearest, most detailed selfies you’ve ever seen. Enjoy real life colours and textures to truly show off the beauty in your photos.

Featured on the back of the phone, you can find the triple camera setup. Now, if you thought the selfie camera was impressive, wait until you see what’s involved with this camera. Starting with the 12MP telephoto lens, you’re going to get some fun focal lengths from this phone. Zoom right in and join the party without ever moving from your spot. Telephoto lenses are common amongst cameras nowadays but you’ve never seen one this high quality before. If you want to zoom in the highest quality, the Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra is for you.

Backing up this is also a 12MP ultra wide camera. Again, these are pretty common amongst cameras but this one is incredibly high quality. With this lens, you’ll be able to take a step back and capture more in a single photo. Really enjoy never having to struggle to squeeze something in again. The final lens, and most impressive one, is the 108MP main camera. Of course, we had to leave the best until last. Using this powerful lens, you’ll be able to capture the world in detail like never before. Enjoy the true to life colours and even low light scenario shooting from this camera.

 

Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra Deals

We’ve gathered the very best Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra deals in one place so that you don’t have to waste time searching other sites. To make sure our deals are top off the market, we pair them with different cashback amounts. These will take down the total cost of your contract and allow you to save money where you least expected to save it. With both redemption and automatic cashback, you can choose how much you save and how you save it. We’ve made sure that there’s something for everyone.

For anyone looking for something low maintenance, the automatic cashback offers are perfect for you. These allow you to forget about the payments and have a nice reminder when you see it on your bank statement. There is absolutely nothing you need to do in order to get this money paid. We will automatically process the full cashback amount after 90 days in order to pay it to you shortly after. Simply pay your monthly bills on time and we’ll do the rest.

Redemption cashback is a little more technical but allows you to get huge amounts of money back from your phone bill. Over the course of the 24 month contract, you’ll be asked to submit your bills on different dates. This goes through to our finance team who will then look to pay it in the next few days. Although it requires slightly more work, it really is worth the hassle. In some cases, we have been able to drop contract prices by half the total cost.

 

If the Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra doesn’t sound like something you really need, make sure to check out the Samsung Galaxy Note 20. With so many different variants in this year’s line up, there’s something for everyone.
